title: Pixel c screen not responding anymore is it covered by warrenty?
content: On vecation my pixel c screen stopped responding to touch. Power button / volume still works. Rebooting it sometimes it will work (20-30 reboots) for a short while (1 hour or so). Bought in november 2017 from uk store. Is it still covered by warrenty and if so how do i get in touch with a google support specialist?
